sentence: She is among 10 guest speakers — a roster that includes Arizona Republican Reps. Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar and Debbie Lesko — along with Ms. Ward, Alveda King and Mike Lindell, CEO of My Pillow.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: Trump rally brings joy, high-profile guests to Arizona Republicans

sentence: Two House members, Reps. Debbie Lesko, R-Ariz., and Bill Johnson, R-Ohio, did not vote.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Lauren Boebert, Ilhan Omar agree on almost nothing. So why did both lawmakers oppose the Russian oil ban?

sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, R-Ariz., didn't vote on that bill.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Rep. Andy Biggs among few to oppose bill suspending normal trade with Russia

sentence: (Note: Arizona Republican Rep. Debbie Lesko also voted not to support NATO.)
author: EJ Montini
title: 'Putinistas' Andy Biggs and Paul Gosar vote against bill to document Russian war crimes
